channel.title: Runescape Old School 2005 - 2006!
channel.description:
Hello all I am looking for some coders maybe 2 - 3 server coders and 2 client coder and also looking for 2 gfx people just incase one is offline I have another person and 2 Website Developers.
It is pretty much a blank source just some skills and little PvP added.
This is a [u]Hyperion 317 Base[/u]
That means their will be no godswords any stuff like that just like it was back than.
Features:
[code]Some PvP, Not fully.
Almost completed Friends and Ignore list.
Mining, Needs a little adding not much.
Woodcutting, Not fully yet.
Firemaking, Started but not completed.
Report Abuse, Needs a bit more touching to it.
Following and Trading, Need to make it trade when you click trade and follow when you click follow.[/code]
So like I said its just some basic stuff added it needs a lot more fixing.
That is why I ask for 2 - 3 Server Coders.
Server Coder Application:
[code] What Age are you: What was the best thing you coded by yourself: How much experience do you have in coding: Will you be Active(Please input how long threw the day, how many hours): Can you Code Hyperion: Email:[/code]
GFX Designer Application:
[code] How much Experience do you have in GFX Designer: Can you make a good enough Banner: Example of your Banners you have Created: Will you be Active(Please input how long threw the day, how many hours): Email:[/code]
Website Dev Application:
[code] How much Experience do you have in Website Developing: Example of the Websites you have created before: Will you be Active(Please input how long threw the day, how many hours): Email: [/code]
Server Devs:
ME
Looking
Looking
Looking
Client Devs:
Looking
Looking
GFX Designers:
Looking
Looking
Website Devs:
Looking
Looking
[size=24pt]You may now Post![/size]

item.title: Runescape Old School 2005 - 2006!
item.dc:creator: @Rock_N_Rolla Rock N Rolla
item.description:
@Rock_N_Rolla wrote:

What Age are you: 16
What was the best thing you coded by yourself: I created a complete PI server with everything working, pvp armours, overloads and torva etc made perfect combat added all bosses etc.
How much experience do you have in coding: 2 years PI & Delta
Will you be Active(Please input how long threw the day, how many hours): completley depends, but real life is more impprtant for me so I will only come on in my spare time.
Can you Code Hyperion: A little ive been learning it for past 1 day haha, but I learn quickly dont worry
Email: ArranMMM@aol.co.uk

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Old School 2005 - 2006!
item.dc:creator: @Leinan1337 Leinan1337
item.description:
@Leinan1337 wrote:

How much Experience do you have in GFX Designer: Have been using photoshop for several years. I have for the most made avatars and stuff for people. I think it would be fun to try make a banner for a server. I can come up with own ideas, but I like it best when someone can lead me in a direction. Not fully, but maybe a render or something

Can you make a good enough Banner: If you give me a day or two i think I can come up with something:) I got a summer job atm, so i only got the nights to work on.

Example of your Banners you have Created: I dont have saved any of my banners, but if you want i can send u some original photos, and the after picture of soem avatars that I have made.

Will you be Active(Please input how long threw the day, how many hours): I can be online up to 12 hours a day on my free days with no job. Otherwice i would be online 4-6 hours. I am europeen GMT +1.

Email: Leinan1337@gmail.com

I have coded a bit RSPS servers my self, delta server Not pro at it, and i know normal RS and PS’s.

Regards
August

Read full topic
